Description: WE ARE FLORIDA'S OLDEST VINTAGE GUITAR SHOP ! 1969 Vox Phantom XII V221 12-String a Black finished all original playing machine ! Very nice all original example (please pardon us for taking pics w/only 6 strings on it) in the classic Black finish w/a natural finished neck, its bound/dot inlaid neck is quite large but feels very comfortable, its original pickgard has shrunk & broken thru a few of the screw areas, its 3 bar pickups have great tone & its original Tremolo system works well but missing its trem arm, cool bridge assembly & aluminum knobs seem to work well, she’s got some weather checking all over, overall she’s excellent & has a very cool patina, she plays great & worth its price of admission, comes w/its original Teardrop shaped hard case. We stock over 200 of the best vintage & collectible guitars in the USA as well as some very unusual classic & modern sports cars. Please click the "See Other Items" icon above to see all we have available. We also buy cool guitars & amps every day as well as any unusual cars…weather it’s 1 item or a whole collection.
Title: 1969 Vox V221 Phantom XII 12-String a very clean all original example !
